function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Asymptomatic infections persist, leading to undetected clusters of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Undetected clusters can result in uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Regular and widespread testing for contagious diseases, and public health interventions for asymptomatic individuals.","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps, and public health surveillance systems.","People":"General population, especially in areas with low testing rates.","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments, and healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of research and collaboration across scientific disciplines for the development of WBE as a public health tool.","Impact":"Limiting the potential of WBE to effectively surveil and monitor infectious diseases at the community level.","Mitigation":"Encouraging interdisciplinary research and collaboration, funding for multi-disciplinary studies, and knowledge-sharing initiatives.","Technologies":"Research partnerships, interdisciplinary data analysis tools, and funding platforms for collaborative research.","People":"Scientists, researchers, and public health experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, and scientific organizations."},{"Description":"Insufficient understanding of the correlation between WBE data and community-wide population demographics in relation to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inability to effectively utilize WBE data to address inter-community disparities related to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Conducting research on the correlation between WBE data and population demographics, and implementing targeted public health interventions based on findings.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, machine learning models for demographic analysis, and public health intervention strategies.","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists, and community health advocates.","Owner":"Academic research institutions, public health agencies, and community organizations."}]}
